name: SHouse
description:
This was a school project i woked on with two of my class mates, i worked on the story, animation, models and gui.

in this first person shooter you start in a safe zone of a subway in UK, here you find a vendor selling you guns, ammo, upgrades and most inportantly a way to free ur son. kill small goblins and maby even a boss to get money and getstronger until u are reunited with ur son.

warning this was a really early project so its really jank and i have goten better an a lot of things sincs then.
